Package rlee348.sounds

Class JayLayer

java.lang.Object
rlee348.sounds.JayLayer
public class JayLayer
extends java.lang.Object
JSoundPlayer JSoundPlayer is a library based off the JLayer library, to enable Java beginners to use it. This library is only tested with standard mp3 files! This player is based off of playlists and sound effects. Playlists are designed for background music, which constantly plays, while sound effects are one-time-only sounds, that can be called when needed.
Author:
Jay Kamat, highly modified by Shelby without regard to Jay's "licenses", also modified by Ryan Lee Manages a Playlists for MP3 files A very tiny bit of this was made by shaines...thank you! Released under the Lesser GNU Lesser General Public License V3.0 This program uses an unmodified version of the JLayer library (1.0.1), it is just bundled inside for convenience. Find the unmodified JLayer library at http://www.javazoom.net/javalayer/javalayer.html Copyright Jay Kamat, 2013

  • Constructor Details

    • JayLayer

      public JayLayer​(java.lang.String prefixBackgroundSounds, java.lang.String prefixSoundEffects, boolean randomize)
      Parameters:
      prefixBackgroundSounds - a prefix (or path) to sound files for background sounds. This is the root directory if null. Example: "audio/"
      randomize - if true, songs in a playlist will be played in random order. If false, songs will be played in the order they are added.
      prefixSoundEffects - a prefix (or path) to sound files for effects. This is the root directory if null. Example: "audio/"

    • JayLayer

      public JayLayer​(boolean doubleSoundCheck)
      This constructor assumes all sound files are in the src directory
      Parameters:
      doubleSoundCheck - if true, this will do a check so a song wont play twice in a row. Leave false if only 1 song in any playlist, otherwise, leave true

  • Method Details

    • addJayLayerListener

      public void addJayLayerListener​(jay.jaysound.JayLayerListener jll)
      Add a new listener. This listener will be notified when sound related events occur.
      Parameters:
      jll - The listener to be added.

    • removeJayLayerListener

      public void removeJayLayerListener​(jay.jaysound.JayLayerListener jll)
      Remove a listener. This listener will no longer be notified when sound related events occur.
      Parameters:
      jll - The listener to be removed.

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      song - the filename of the song (the prefix will be included)
      Returns:
      the index of the song you just added

    • setRandomizePlayOrder

      public void setRandomizePlayOrder​(boolean b)
      Sets the randomizer
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • nextSong

      public void nextSong()
      changes the sound (stays in the same playlist). Please call the setPlaylist method first this also starts the sound if there is nothing playing
